entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow or rain. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
